name: iPrep Practice App
description: iPrep is an enjoyable practice app designed to make your students fall in love with practice, mastery and growth.   It offers personalised practice on each topic with the current mastery. iPrep also offers topic wise tests and full syllabus tests with review for instant improvement in learning outcomes.   The iPrep Practice App is available for all classes from 1st to 10th and covers Math, Science and English.   Fundamental principles of iPrep:  1. Student Centric & Enjoyable - iPrep envisions to happily engage your students and make them enjoy practice as a means of mastering every topic.   2. Non -Judgemental - Personalised Practice in iPrep inspires the students to practice and improve in a non judgemental and positive learning environment. It can transform the students approach towards learning and growth.   3. Remedial & Instant Corrective - The best moment to help a child identify the conceptual error he/she made is right then. iPrep gives instant concept feedback for transformational improvements in learning levels.   iPrep tries to make your students enjoy practice, master every topic and perform wonderfully better in every exam they face.   It celebrates the childs experential nature & his zeal to practice!   Happy Learning!
